pr_title: feat(ui/search): search release using id while linking it to project

timeline.bodyText:
Both Name and Version hyperlink is opening Release details page.
Ideally. Name should open the component details page.
Kindly fix it.
timeline.author: akapti

replies.bodyText: Fixed it along with renaming the column name to Component Name and Release Version respectively.
replies.author: smrutis1

timeline.message:
feat(ui/search): Search using rel. id and added link to the release in the search result

Signed-off-by: Smruti Sahoo <smruti.sahoo@siemens.com>

feat(ui/search): Search using rel. id and added link to the release in the search result
